You patted impatiently on the table of the pizza restaurant. You couldn't believe how badly you had lost that bet, but you did learn the biggest lesson of your life: Never make bets off of a Superbowl game. Now you were on a date with a girl you had never even seen before, and when you tried to ask your friends for details about her, they just wouldn't stop snickering.

You'd arrived a little early, looking over at some of the happy couples in adjacent booths, and wondered what kind of person Chloe was. The most important thing was that you make a good impression, so you abstained from looking at your phone in case she happened to walk in at that moment.

"Hello, you must be (name)..." a feminine voice sounded. Snapping out of your thoughts, you turned your head to see a girl completely made of slime standing in front of you. "I'm Chloe, your date." She greeted.

What color was she?

You looked up to see a girl made of bright red slime standing in front of you. She had flowing red hair which also looked to be made out of slime. In fact, every part of her body seemed to consist of slime. Her beautiful pink eyes, her full-looking lips, everything. And what a body on the girl too! She was the definition of 'hourglass figure', and one thing you noticed was that she looked as though she was completely naked.

You were completely bewildered, never having seen anything like this (in real life) before. You rapidly rubbed your eyes, hoping that they were just playing tricks on you but to no avail.

"Hello? Are you okay?" Chloe asked with a concerned look on her face.

You had to say something, anything to drum up a conversation. "I... um... uh..." You stammered, before finally asking "Are you made of slime?"

Chloe giggled. "Yes! Do you want to touch me and see?" She asked, You nodded slowly, putting a hand on Chloe's shoulder and slowly moving down her arm. Chloe began moaning at your touch. She was warm, smooth and solid. "That feels nice..." she mumbled, almost mesmerized by the feeling of you touching her.

"Wow..." you muttered, taking your hand away. "If you're... um... slime, how are you... like, solid?" you asked.

"I can solidify and liquify any part of my body at will." Chloe explained, moving to sit down opposite you. "It gets harder for me to focus when submerged in other liquids though."

"Oh... Okay..." you muttered. "Well, I haven't ordered yet, but are you hungry?" you asked.

Chloe grinned, leaning closer to you. "Unbelievably! In fact, I'm so hungry I could swallow you whole!"

"Wh-what?!" you panicked, hoping that Chloe was just joking.

She stopped rubbing your back and forced you into her by absorbing your hands through her stomach, as there was suddenly no resistance, you almost fell right through Chloe, but ended up getting more of your body caught inside her.

But what was worse than that was that none of the other patrons in the pizza place, nor the staff, seemed at all put off by Chloe's behavior. No, everyone around you just kept on doing their own thing, as if you were completely invisible to them.

It was only a matter of time before you found yourself in the center of Chloe's body, Chloe reshaping herself around you as you became forced into an awkward seating position. "Chloe!" you shouted, pushing, kicking and screaming with all your might but no one from the outside paid any notice. You assumed that Chloe heard you, because she started to hum to herself as she traced a hand around where your head was. You kept shouting and screaming at her, but little good it all did. By the end of it, you had lost your voice.

Eventually, Chloe stopped walking. You tried to look out of her, but it was so dark that the night sky, combined with the red tint over everything made it impossible for you to see anything. "Wh-where are we?" you asked, now genuinely afraid. You had no idea where Chloe had taken you, and you were well and truly at her mercy.

"Your new home where we can live together forever." Chloe said nonchalantly, walking up a rickety set of steps.

"New... home...?" By this point, you were too tired to fight back as Chloe walked inside a very old house. You were still not able to see the outside of Chloe very well, but you became forced onto your back as Chloe laid down on a mattress and massaged her full belly just a little.

1121.content:
You groggily woke up, your vision filled with red, the events of your date with a bizarre slime girl the night before almost a blur. That is, until you attempted to stand up and found that you couldn’t, hitting your head on what felt like a ceiling of latex.

Feverishly, you looked around, seeing yourself surrounded by an eternal wall of red slime. You then remembered what happened, how you went out on a blind date with a girl made of slime, and she kidnapped you before even spending two minutes with you!

Chloe’s slow breathing made you assume that she was asleep, and so you attempted to push your way out of Chloe’s belly, hoping that it would be easier for you to get out with her being asleep. Unfortunately, that wasn’t the case, and you pressing against her only served to wake her up.

"(name)?" Chloe groaned. "Why are you trying to escape?" She asked, almost sounding confused.

Although you knew that she was probably referring to the fact it was pointless to try, you decided to point out the facts of reality, snapping at your captor. "Chloe, you kidnapped me! You didn't even give the date a chance!"

Chloe gasped, your outburst of anger apparently shocking her. "I…" she stammered. "I didn't want you to run away! I’d heard about you from my friends for a while, and you sounded like a really great person. The fact that you were even willing to go out on a date with me… I figured you, you know… the one guy that might actually like me… I didn't want you to go off with some other girl!" Chloe sobbed.

Your expression softened, and you found yourself feeling a little guilty. "Chloe… You didn’t have to kidnap me." You told her. "I was perfectly willing to go on a date with you. I didn’t even know you were made of slime, and that truthfully doesn’t matter to me. I mean, apart from the whole kidnapping thing, you seem nice enough, and-"

"Really (name)? You're the best!" Chloe cut you off, your minimalistic complement being seemingly all that was needed to raise her spirits. "Well, you probably want to be cleaned up so…" Chloe trailed off, edging off the bed and reaching inside herself as she began to feel around for you.

"Chloe, what are you doing?" you asked, Chloe’s hands reaching around your torso as she started pulling at your shirt. It soon became apparent that what she was trying to do was undress you. Still, the way she was going about it left you truly dumbfounded. "Ch-Chloe! Stop! Please!" you struggled, trying to keep your clothes on.

"Sorry, (name). I don't want you to run away and get lost!" Chloe giggled, continuing to take off your clothes. Despite your struggles, you couldn't help but marvel at how Chloe was able to control the different parts of her body so easily.

It wasn't long before you were stark naked inside Chloe as she gently folded your clothes on the bed before getting up and walking out the side entrance to the house, opening the door and heading out to the veranda, moving over to a Jacuzzi and fiddling with a few knobs.

You started to sink inside Chloe's body as she then began to flow out, and forced you to her, for lack of a better word, surface. You gasped a little, attempting once again to get out of Chloe's body, only to find yourself pulled back in by a pair of hands. You heard a giggling noise, and looked up to see Chloe staring down at you, laughing.

"Relax, I'm just giving you a bath! I do this with all my friends now and then, they all love it!" Chloe giggled, grabbing onto your shoulders, and having you sit down. You relaxed, realizing that it actually felt pretty nice inside Chloe. It was nice and warm, you had no trouble breathing, and it was even bubbly!

Your stomach rumbled a little, as you remembered that you didn’t end up eating anything last night while on your date. Chloe giggled. "Hungry, are you? Well, let’s rectify that!" She smiled, before leaning down and pressing her lips tightly against yours in an overly-passionate French kiss.

You couldn't help but moan as Chloe cupped your face with her hands until she gently pried your mouth open wider and you felt some liquid ooze down your throat. It took a while, but you realized that the liquid was Chloe! She was feeding herself to you!

Chloe tasted a little bit like raspberry Jell-O, which, while a little off-putting given the circumstances, was probably a lot better than other things she could’ve potentially tasted like.

You were still in too much of a daze as Chloe forced some of herself down your throat. You were surprised that you weren't choking on her. She seemed to be very considerate for the most part and obviously wanted you to enjoy the feeling too.

It wasn't long before you felt yourself getting full, and Chloe pulled away. You were surprised that Chloe had kept the same mass, even though you were sure you had just swallowed a large amount of her. Chloe ended the liplock with another little kiss and patted your now-full stomach.

Her smile widened, suddenly chirping. "Well, time to start our day! You won't need clothes, since you'll be inside me the whole time!" Chloe gushed.

Chloe then started to turn back into her ‘regular’ form, pushing you back up against her cleavage. Your lips pressed against Chloe’s breasts lightly as you sank into them once more, reaching out and hugging your head against her breasts tightly, completely overcome with ecstasy.

"Anyway, what should we do today?" Chloe asked out loud, before tapping her body lightly when you were 'safe' inside her. "Ooh, I know!" she shouted. "Let’s go to the Waterpark!" Clasping her hands together, Chloe looked down at you. "What do you think, (name)? Does that sound like fun?"

"I-" you attempted to answer Chloe’s question, but she cut you off.

"You want to go, don’t you? Don’t you?"

You sighed. "Do I have a choice?" you asked.

"(name), you know I'm the one that will pick where we go from now on." Chloe stated proudly, tidying up the area around her before moving to lock up the house and head for the Waterpark.

Now that it was day time, you noticed Chloe’s house was actually in a suburb quite a way’s away from your place. Additionally, your eyes widened, remembering that you were naked inside Chloe and sincerely hoping that any onlookers who could see Chloe couldn’t see you.

Surprisingly, Chloe really didn’t talk to you at all during your walk to the Waterpark, which actually gave you plenty of time to think. Chloe had no idea where you lived, so if you managed to escape, you could find your way back home and then confront your so-called 'friends'. So all you really had to do until then was stay on Chloe's good side, which was actually really easy. Besides kidnapping you and holding you inside of her against your will, she was a very nice girl. Even now, the rubbing of her stomach seemed to calm you. She was obviously trying to make you feel more at home inside her.

* * *

The line to get even get into the Waterpark was absolutely massive, and just like at the pizza restaurant, it was as if you were invisible inside Chloe, which in this circumstance was a very good thing.

You looked around, surveying the massive crowds of people all around you as Chloe walked. You realized if you did manage to get out of Chloe's body, it would be extremely easy to lose her in the crowds of people.

"Look at the water slide! Let’s do that one first!" Chloe gawked, running her hands along where your head was. The water slide that Chloe was staring at towered over everything else and went all the way into a giant pool. Chloe ran towards the line, standing in it for five minutes as the two of you slow neared the top. Every now and then, Chloe rubbed her belly and looked down at you with a smile.

Once the two of you got to the top of the slide, the man at top looked over at Chloe and then her giant belly. Without another word, he pointed her to the slide. Chloe jumped down the fifty foot slide screaming all the way down, until Chloe collided with the water in a giant splash.

As Chloe's body impacted the water, you begin to feel a little uneasy. You looked down, realizing Chloe’s body was rapidly filling with water from the pool. But you were still trapped inside her. Water began filling your line of vision as you struggled to keep your head above the water. Eventually, you were completely submerged, and no longer able to breathe.

Just when you thought your life was over and you were going to drown, you suddenly fell right through Chloe, dropping through the bottom of her and into the pool itself.

Your eyes widened, regaining momentum as best you could as you began swimming to the edge of the pool. Chloe had been dispersed, temporarily most likely, but the good news was that you were free and you were alive. You got out of the pool, looking back to it and finding that the pool water now had a strong red tint to it, as if Chloe had been assimilated into it. You looked at your reflection for a moment as you once again remembered that Chloe never did give you your clothes back. You were standing butt naked in a water park.

You quickly ran to some bushes to hide your shame, peeking out behind them to survey your surroundings. There was a very low fence behind you, and on the other side of that, a parking lot. If you were lucky, you could’ve easily jumped over it and escaped.

Unfortunately for you, you weren’t that lucky.

Of all the people to have walked past you general area, it had to be the person you wouldn’t have wanted to have seen in a million years: your ex-girlfriend Kim.

To say things didn’t end on good terms with her would’ve been a total understatement, what with you finding out she’d been cheating on you. Still, you had been fortunate enough to avoid her entirely since the breakup, and you were hoping to keep it that way.

Judging by her red one-piece you were willing to bet that she’d succeeded in getting the job as Lifeguard at the Waterpark, which was good for her but bad for you. There was no way in Hell you’d let her see you how you were, but if you stuck around inside, you knew that Chloe might reform and then you'd be trapped all over again.

You took a deep breath, stepping out from the bush to make a mad run for the fence.

"Um…" you started. "I think I might pop home for a little bit… i-if that’s okay…"

"Oh…" I paused. "Um… no, I kinda meant I go home on my own, just to get a few things…"

"That’s silly! I’ll come with you, okay?" Chloe beamed, yourself sighing in defeat. You could argue with her all day if you wanted, but in the end, you couldn’t really do anything to stop her coming with you.

Your decision to go home was pretty much entirely based on the fact that you needed a change of clothes, and unfortunately, Chloe had decided to come with you for whatever reason she had.

In retrospect, letting her come with you and basically doing nothing about it wasn't the best idea. Chloe now knew where you lived and could come 'visit' you at any time. Despite her being a generally nice ‘person’, you were at odds with her behavior. She was possessive, and if what she did to Kim was any indication, violent too. You gave them the whole story, how you’d gone out with Chloe like you’d promised, and she ended up kidnapping you, forcing you to stay the night at her place, and then dragging you off to a Waterpark the following day, all while being trapped inside her.

All they did was laugh, even when you told them what happened with Kim. Bummer. At least you knew where you really stood in the eyes of your friends.

You sighed heavily and re-joined the girls outside, hoping that they would’ve gotten along a little, or at the very least, Chloe was treating Kim with dignity. As you came out the front door, you noticed, Chloe had allowed Kim’s head to come out of her belly.

"Oh, good. You two are getting along-"

"(name), I want you to pick one of us to love forever." Chloe stated boldly.

"Is it true you dated this girl?" Chloe pried.

"Yes." you admitted. "Kim and I were in a relationship, but we broke up because…" you stopped, sighing. "Because of some altercations. I don't see why you're so jealous." you told her.

"Yes, I did."

"Well, you can't love both of us! So you have to choose one of us to love! Pick me so I can put this ex of yours back in my belly."

"(name), please, I’m so sorry I laughed at you. I made a mistake and I see that now. And I know you want a human girlfriend, so pick me so I can get out of this slime and we can work things out." Kim piped up.

You took an uneasy step back. You would have never thought you’d have ended up in a situation like this, even with everything else that had been going on. In regular circumstances, you would have chosen the dirt over Kim for how she treated you, but Kim was a human being and deserved a certain amount of respect and dignity. Chloe keeping her hostage inside her was morally not the right thing to do.

But at the same time, Kim basically ripped your heart right out of your chest by cheating on you, and you knew that with or without her in your life that there’d always been an emptiness that could never be filled. Maybe she deserved everything she got… Maybe you were better off with Chloe…

Chloe then stares at you with her golden eyes and gives a mischievous look noticing your reaction, smiling as she crept toward you slowly. "Cmon now (your name), why are you so shy. This IS how I usually am when I'm not in public. I'm just trying to relax and yet it seems like your starting to get stiff." She cooed in a sly manner. info.brief_description: A girl made of slime has fallen madly in love with you. Original story by "heptagonhail".
info.description:
Story concept, outline and contents property of former Writing.Com member "heptagonhail". I claim no ownership of submitted content. Minor alterations to dialog and such have been made to improve the flow of the story. Other users are free to add their own chapters as they see fit.

It's been four months since you've broken up with your now ex-girlfriend Kim. You've been trying to get back out there and date but haven't had much success, until one night you discuss your relationship woes with your friends. They'd been trying to set you up with a girl named Chloe for a while, but you weren't really interested. Nevertheless, to appease your friends, you told them you'd go on a date with Chloe if your team lost the Superbowl that year...

Rules:

1. Please write in 2nd Person P.O.V.
2. Both the main character and Chloe cannot be killed off.
3. Content which breaks from reality (Body Inflation, Transformation, Transgender, Vore, Unbirth etc.) is acceptable.
4. Fetishistic content (the main character having a foot fetish, for example) is allowed, as long as there is an alternative pathway that does not include said content in the event that a reader may find said content unnerving.
5. Chloe's abilities and backstory are not defined at the story's outset. Feel free to make up your own.
6. Any chapters I find with spelling mistakes or grammatical errors will be corrected.

Enjoy!
